snippet: The conference was the first that the Four A’s has held in the Los Angeles area, executives said, and as a result it featured a roster of celebrities.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column presents highlights, lowlights and sidelights of the annual Transformation conference of the Four A's (formerly the American Association of Advertising Agencies).
lead_paragraph: The conference was the first that the Four A’s has held in the Los Angeles area, executives said, and as a result it featured a roster of celebrities.

headline.print_headline: Stars of Hollywood and Madison Avenue
headline.seo: Star Power and Reminiscing at Four A’s Conference
headline.main: Stars of Hollywood and Madison Avenue
